"Communication with Other Players":
"PSO2 allows you to communicate with other players in the following ways:

[Chat]
You can make your character speak in text. Open the Chat Window with the \"Start Chat\" button, type what you want to say using the keyboard, and press Enter to send it.
[Group Chat]
This is a system that allows you to designate a specific group of players you want to chat with and talk to all of them at once.
[Voice Chat]
You can communicate with other players via the spoken word.
You can only use voice chat to communicate with players in your party.
You will need a microphone to use voice chat."
